reviewText: Great DVD. Fast shipping. Thank you. Will buy from again.
Was a disappointment. jalf baked TV show
Great stuff...love Dick Powell in anything

blake Edwards.....dick powell.....the writing resonates.....this is like chandler......as good now as it was 50 years ago....the episodes don't creak....they are a lot of fun.....and $6.....can't be beat...
If you enjoy good old vintage movies from the 1950's you will enjoy this. Dick Powell is terrific.
I  find the old classics very enjoyable to watch and Dick Powell as a true professional.  I recommend this to anyone interested in old time entertainment.
Enjoyed it very much.  Brought back memories of watching it on TV.
Great series - Wish there were more episodes.
The character and his crew are likable, but the story lines are thin at best.  Didn't watch TV back then so I don't know how representative this is of what TV series were like!
I liked the stories, But there was something wrong with the disc or the reproduction
Hard to go against Dick Powell!
Love these, but love Dick Powel, especially in "Susan Slept Here".  Great Movie !!

Unfortunately, I was hoping for something with more "meet" but was provided four short stories with our hero, Dick Powell. He gives a pretty good performance although obviously over-confident, but shows his obsession with chain-smoking throughout which sadly killed him by the age of 58.  I think the stories were a little bit too cookie-cutter clean and trite for my taste.  He was the producer so I believe he had final say in reviewing his performance which I do not think was nearly as good as in the musicals of the late 30s. Not the greatest investment.
love Dick Powell but thought there was going to be more adventures than presented in this vid.
Dated TV drama, yet enjoyable.  Powell was a better actor than many thought. But the short TV shows leave little room for story development.
